statements.select:
SELECT sysdiagrams.name AS NAME_SYSDIAGRAMS, sysdiagrams.principal_id AS PRINCIPAL_ID_SYSDIAGRAMS, sysdiagrams.diagram_id AS DIAGRAM_ID_SYSDIAGRAMS, sysdiagrams.version AS VERSION_SYSDIAGRAMS, sysdiagrams.definition AS DEFINITION_SYSDIAGRAMS FROM sysdiagrams
sysdiagrams.name = #Name#
sysdiagrams.principal_id = #PrincipalId#
sysdiagrams.diagram_id = #DiagramId#
sysdiagrams.version = #Version#
sysdiagrams.definition = #Definition#

SELECT sysdiagrams.name AS NAME_SYSDIAGRAMS, sysdiagrams.principal_id AS PRINCIPAL_ID_SYSDIAGRAMS, sysdiagrams.diagram_id AS DIAGRAM_ID_SYSDIAGRAMS, sysdiagrams.version AS VERSION_SYSDIAGRAMS, sysdiagrams.definition AS DEFINITION_SYSDIAGRAMS FROM sysdiagrams WHERE sysdiagrams.diagram_id = #value#

SELECT sysdiagrams.name AS NAME_SYSDIAGRAMS, sysdiagrams.principal_id AS PRINCIPAL_ID_SYSDIAGRAMS, sysdiagrams.diagram_id AS DIAGRAM_ID_SYSDIAGRAMS, sysdiagrams.version AS VERSION_SYSDIAGRAMS, sysdiagrams.definition AS DEFINITION_SYSDIAGRAMS FROM sysdiagrams WHERE sysdiagrams.principal_id = #PrincipalId# AND sysdiagrams.name = #Name#

SELECT sysdiagrams.name AS NAME_SYSDIAGRAMS, sysdiagrams.principal_id AS PRINCIPAL_ID_SYSDIAGRAMS, sysdiagrams.diagram_id AS DIAGRAM_ID_SYSDIAGRAMS, sysdiagrams.version AS VERSION_SYSDIAGRAMS, sysdiagrams.definition AS DEFINITION_SYSDIAGRAMS FROM sysdiagrams
sysdiagrams.name = #Name#
sysdiagrams.principal_id = #PrincipalId#
sysdiagrams.diagram_id = #DiagramId#
sysdiagrams.version = #Version#
sysdiagrams.definition = #Definition#

SELECT sysdiagrams.name AS NAME_SYSDIAGRAMS, sysdiagrams.principal_id AS PRINCIPAL_ID_SYSDIAGRAMS, sysdiagrams.diagram_id AS DIAGRAM_ID_SYSDIAGRAMS, sysdiagrams.version AS VERSION_SYSDIAGRAMS, sysdiagrams.definition AS DEFINITION_SYSDIAGRAMS FROM sysdiagrams WHERE sysdiagrams.diagram_id = #value#

SELECT sysdiagrams.name AS NAME_SYSDIAGRAMS, sysdiagrams.principal_id AS PRINCIPAL_ID_SYSDIAGRAMS, sysdiagrams.diagram_id AS DIAGRAM_ID_SYSDIAGRAMS, sysdiagrams.version AS VERSION_SYSDIAGRAMS, sysdiagrams.definition AS DEFINITION_SYSDIAGRAMS FROM sysdiagrams WHERE sysdiagrams.principal_id = #PrincipalId# AND sysdiagrams.name = #Name#
statements.insert: INSERT INTO sysdiagrams (name, principal_id, diagram_id, version, definition) VALUES(#Name#, #PrincipalId#, #DiagramId#, #Version#, #Definition#)
statements.update: UPDATE sysdiagrams SET name = #Name#, principal_id = #PrincipalId#, diagram_id = #DiagramId#, version = #Version#, definition = #Definition# WHERE sysdiagrams.diagram_id = #DiagramIdOld#
statements.delete: DELETE FROM sysdiagrams WHERE sysdiagrams.principal_id = #PrincipalId# AND sysdiagrams.name = #Name#
